text: Ana ava'nafima koge'za kini trara eri'za e'za noma'are erinte fatgo hu'za eme nentage'na ke'noe. Anama hutazageno'a korapa'ma mani'neno, mani vava nehia Anumzamo'a tra'a erino mani'neno vahe refko huzmantenaku eme ante'ne. Kukenama hu'nea kukenamo'a efeke hampomo hiaza huno efenentake nehigeno, azokamo'a efenentake hu'ne. Hagi agrama mani'nea kini tra'mofona tevemo hagna hagna nehigeno, anama mani'nea tra'mofo wirifina tevemo akarukaru huno nerege'na ke'noe.
